description: The Amzer Grey Jelly Case is made out of 100% premium silicone and is a great, light-weight option for protecting your Apple new iPad. The durable silicone absorbs any shock your Apple new iPad may receive from any accidental drops or bumps, keeping it just like new. The smooth silicone gives you a sure and lasting grip on your Apple new iPad and minimizes sliding on flat surfaces. You have full access to your Apple new iPad without removing it from the case. The Jelly Case is truly like a second skin and a must have accessory for your Apple new iPad.
title: Amzer Silicone Jelly Skin Fit Case Cover for Apple iPad 2 and iPad 3 - Black
